description: an old woman at right seated near a window holding a child; a dog and a boy playing at center; two men around a fireplace left background

title: Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, plate 28 from"Cabinet Poullain:Collection de cent-vingt estampes graves d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de Mr. Poullain"
